text: The National Space Agency of Ukraine (NASU), now known as the State Space Agency of Ukraine (SSAU), is the Ukrainian government agency responsible for space policy and programs. Established on February 29, 1992, following the dissolution of the Soviet Union, it was initially called the National Space Agency of Ukraine (NSAU) until December 9, 2010, when it was renamed. Category:Organizations based in Ukraine Category:Space agencies
title: National Space Agency of Ukraine
